description:
Collection management, as name implies Is to tool to collect receivables that customers owe. This Course has been created for anyone who wants to understand FSCM Collections management and how it integrates with FI AR and other related modules.

This course will help you Configure and implement FSCM Collections management in any Project. The course length is 3 hours, but i will be adding adding additional videos answering questions of any student who take this course.

The course is structured in a Easy to understand and No non sense way. I have tried to explain everything by showing an example, which would allow you to under stand the concept better.

Almost every company that has SAP is implementing Collections management. It is one of the very efficient modules in FSCM. This course will enable SAP consultants to implement this module in their projects.
title: SAP FSCM Collections management
